title: who i am
message: I am a web developer based in Malvern, PA. My passion is software development and helping create applications that solve practical problems.

title: what i can do
message: I create "mobile first" web sites and applications. I was previously hired to create a web application that collected health insurance information from an API. See other work I have done in my projects page.

title: how i can help
message: Need helping fixing or making your website? Need a web or mobile application solution to your business problems? Send me a message and let's talk about how I can help meet your needs.
